title: Into the Woods: A Werewolf Romance
description: Once upon a time, there was a little girl whose mother always told her bedtime stories before she went to sleep. Stories about big black red-eyed beasts that walked during the nights, where they would destroy villages and kill people in an effort to find their lovers. Soul mates.Lovers to whom they will be bound to until death separates them apart.Elizabeth Zemerlöw simply didn’t believe those stories when she moved to Canada to start her new life with her Aunt Lena and Uncle Louis; but all that has changed when she was suddenly attacked by a big black beast that prowled into the night along with a devilishly handsome man named Henry.With her new life just starting to unfold before her, Elizabeth is starting to question everything she used to believe in including those stories her mother used to tell her.Could they be true?
author: Isabel Wolf
